Submodules¶

jrnl.system.system module¶

class jrnl.system.system.System(path, preferences={}, paths_by_id={}, headings_by_id={}, id_count=0)[source]¶

Bases: object

The interface to access journals.

The system manages

  • the journals
  • storage space
  • journal management (create, delete, store)
close_journal(journal)[source]¶

Close the journal by saving all data and zipping the directory, if self.preferences.zip_journals is set.

Returns: None

create_journal(heading, description, authors, tags=[], dtime='now', datetime_fmt='%d.%m.%Y-%H:%M:%S', need_storage=False)[source]¶

Create a new journal.

WARNING: this will just create the journal. In order to use it you must open_journal this journal.

Returns: the journal_id

dump()[source]¶

Write the system to the system storage file.

static from_dict(dct)[source]¶
open_journal(id_)[source]¶

Open the journal with the given ID.

Returns: The Journal.

save_journal(journal)[source]¶

Save the journal by copying all new files and writing the JSON files.

Returns: None

to_dict()[source]¶

Convert this system to a dict representation.

version = '0.0.1'¶
